trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Morgantown
There were no other sightings in Morgantown on or around February 11th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving westbound on I-68 and saw a dull orange light. There was very heavy cloud cover so I am sure it was not a star or a satellite. I also ad my scanner on in my truck set to the aircraft frequencies and there seemed to be no local traffic in the area. I got off the nearest exit (#4) and the orange sphere dimmed on and off while it traveled from North East to the South East. As a person with aeronautics experience, I can say with great certainty this was not an aircraft. I ave emailed my friend who works at Morgantown Airport (KMGW) to see if he had anything strange on radar tonight.
Summary: Round orange disk traveling from North West to South East.
